title: For Sale:  Bernardelli P 018S
postcontent:
Used gun. There was about 300 rounds through it according to previous owner. It comes with a cleaning kit, 84 rounds, original case and pamphlet, one mag and a 6.5 inch soft digital camo case.  

The Bernardelli P-018 pistol appeared on the market in the mid-1980s, as a police and civilian side-arm. The 9mm version was intended mostly for the police use, while 7.65mm version ws intended for European civilian market, where in some countries such as Italy or France, civilians are prohibited to own guns in "military" calibers. P-018 was used by some European police forces.
Technically, P-018 is a quite straightforward design, with Browning-type, linkless short recoil system of automatic and double-action trigger, The asfety is frame-mounted, and the sights are dovetailed into slide.

title: For Sale:  DPMS LR308B Heavy Barrel
postcontent:
For Sale is a DPMS LR308B.  It has an 18" Heavy Barrel.  This is a very accurate rifle.  It consistently shoots under an inch with Hornady Match Ammo.  It has less than 200 rounds fired through it.  I have only shot Hornady Match through it.  It has never had cheap ammo ran through it. I have upgraded the stock to a Magpul ACS.  It had a standard A2 Stock on it from the factory.  One of the most accurate rifles I have ever owned.

It will come with a Magpul 20 Rd Magazine.  I have also upgraded the pistol grip to a Hogue.

This is not the inexpensive sportical or oracle DPMS model.

It has a Leupold VX-R 2-7X33 on it.  I will include it with the scope, Leupold PRW Rings, and Leupold flip covers for $500 more which is less than the replacement cost of the items.  I don't want to take it off unless it is sold without it.

I am not interested in Trades.  I can be reached at 405.Four Eight One. Zero Seven Four Nine.  Text or email works great.

I have around $2000 in this setup and it is a shooter.

$1100 for rifle and stock
$1600 for complete setup with scope
